## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                          | Type                                      | Default                  |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| `dateformat` | `dateformat` | DayJS datetime formatting            | `string`                                  | `'D MMMM YYYY HH:mm:ss'` |
| `locale`     | `locale`     | DayJS country-based locale formating | `"de" \| "en" \| "fr" \| "ja" \| "zh-cn"` | `'en'`                   |
